Blog.post: yesterday,went out wif my sister than meet huiqing..really quite enjoyable. bot two clips.one 4 baobei eunice n another one 4 baobei may. nv bot for huiqing cuz she oso got bot for her own. i really tat its only wen eunice n may quarrel than they will come find me.if not,wen they nv quarrel n was gd,they oso nv think of me.really feel irritated. y my frens treated me like this.was really unfair to me. wen got problems than find me. wen things r fine with them,they wont even bother find me. wad the... i really have nothing to say lo.i hate to say it but i still have to say out.my heart really don feel good.i treated all my frens better den my stead.y my frens must betray me wen i did nothing bad to them.am i really such a bad fren to every1? or am i too stupid to treat them so gd.i really don understand from the day S.P backstab me,betray me. i really felt tat i change alot.from a cheerful ger to a no emotion,no smile,no nothing de me. i hate this peishan of me now.really hate. putting a fake smile infront of every1 out there.tried to make myself feel better without frens,family n stead, but the hardest i tried, the more unhappy i was.every of my family members n stead thinks that i am a very strong ger,which can live on myself. but no one noes, i was very lonely inside. sometimes,really feel to live on someone.cuz i was tired.the more i wanted the person,the make i care.i felt that nowdays,i very easy PC.very easy angry.cuz i reali dono wad my heart is thinking.reali love #02 alot but i dono really noe hoe to express to let #02 noe.very very trouble n fan abt tat.although care u alot,but din show out.i oso dono wad am i doing all this while.always angry u n my frens.everytime meet u or wad,oso nv tok much. jus stares in the air.dono thinking wad.all cuz of my frens out there.influencing me.esp P.S n S.P!!!! say le oso very angry n sad.don say le. maybe i shouldn't treat my frens gd.but i cant help treating them like my baobei. very xin ku. very tong ku. i reali dono abt my frenship wif every1.**confuse**.. can anyone jus tell me am i a very bad fren?? everyday work till tired n late.cuz of #02 n cuz i don wana remember things tat make me sad n i don wan cry in the dark in my room. nvm..today is a new day..hope everything is fine.. i was so tired alr. but don wana slp...#02, go sleep lol.. i noe u very very tired..nite.. love u.

jus 5 hours ago,from 7pm till now,was feeling so happy,so loved by my dar dar.wad can i do,haha,jus laugh with her,n make her laugh. tat was the thing i wan everyday. as fer my baobei,i alr dono how to say,they mistaken tat i don wana tell them thingys,but i onli tell malaysian crew. i alr said,they r my baobeiz,i sure wan tell them right.but i cant possible to tell three in one shot right.if they r worried abt me n they care alot fer me,i am telling u all tat,i oso care fer u all alot lo.baobeiz,u can ask airlia,i treat u all beta than her.i everytime becuz of u all piang sia her,throw her aside.i trust u all but u all should alr noe wad happen to me n my jiemei in sch right.u noe they betray me n hurt me deep right.i reali dono how lo.how to be hard hearted n not forgive them.i noe if is MAY,u alr beat the person who betray u right?but i don noe how to don forgive my jiemei.i told her everything of mine,in the end i exchange a betray. i can tell u all my things cuz i trust u all but do u all trust me? u all mistaken me. i understand u all,cuz i go tried to understand. ok,don say abt tat le.should say some happy things.haiz.school going reopen n i cant see my baobeiz so much le.but hope u all wont forget me!! n my dar dar,i always miss u n love u.No others people.ok.. don always quarrel about ur jealousy le lar.. don always say wan muackz muackz le horx..

haiz,now than i noe abt how airlia treat yunai last time.haiz, wen first start to stead with dar,she oso like nv 4get jervin,like still love jervin alot lo.tis few days,nv quarrel with dar liao cuz i tried to give in n tried to laugh wen she entertain me wen i angry lo,cuz i don wan anymore quarrel. haiz,as fer my baobeiz,jus now i go mac,put letter in may's bag den i walk to meet up with airlia n my sister liao.cuz i reali dono how liao..wana tok to her but dono how to open my mouth first.she oso nv look at me oso.they open one frenster account,oso don have my name n don have my pic in it.so u all noe how sad i will be.nvm,i noe u all nv treat me as part of u all.everytime u all haven come,i have to wait for u three all reach le den eat,i oso nv scold u all late or wad.but on eunice birthday,u all eat finish le den i reach but i didnt late lo,is eunice say meet 11am.i 11am reach lo.than i angry oso cannot.nvm. if u all wana lidat treat me,i don mind cuz sch is going reopen,i wont see u all often le. today go out wif dar n watching her sleep,feel tat we alr very long nv so happy le. finallyy,we two days nv quarrel le. i jus cant stop loving her.. her cute&blur face. dar,i gota tell u some words which everytime i nv say out. "i love u for wad u r now,i cant stop loving u,so don suspect the love i have for u,don listen to others,trust ur sense n trust me.please. n thanks god tat he send u to me." n i got some words to say to my baobeiz. "u three is my forever baobeiz even if we quarrel or watever.. n may,u should noe i very easily forgive my frens around me,esp u all n my jeimeiz.. n i think i don bother u all so much,wont find u all so much le.." tats wad i can do to make u all n me happy. i miz my dar dar,my baobeiz,my jeimeiz alot alot forever de lo..even if they did bad to me,cuz i jus simply love them too much. but if, they betray me,backstabb me,i wont 4give. n i jus cant stop toking abt my dar dar cuz all tis is specially for her. n my baobeiz,but now me n them not gd..haiz..dono wad to say le la.. so bored* so fan*

today is the first day of sch reopen, i am having a headach & almost fainted. today leh,my dar dar hor so badx, morning sms halfway den slp like pig.slp until 9am den wake up. *zhu* until now,i still very giddy.. haix.wen will i recover lehx.. baobeix,if u say tat me n ur suo wei de laopox got a very big different den i got nothing to say.so u all r my baobei not my laopox den i will onli tell my laopox my things. is u say baobei n laopox got big different right.nvm. now sch reopen le right, i wont see u all so much de larx. i got tell u all or nv tell u all my problems is still the same!! u all three together can liao, i don need to join u all either le right. its okay.. on ur birthday i don tell u cuz is ur birthday right.so how can i tell u.nvm. everythings over.holiday over. now we all jus concentrate on studies. others, don need say so much ok. u all takecare lo.nth to say le. dardar, don be naughty! n i am very tired tis few days. n today oso dono y. so giddy n wanted to fainted.tis is the third day nv quarrel le.keep it on ok. n i don wish see u & juehui & cyn always together.i don wana see u call them or they call u again ok. remember takecare n drink lots of water. take pay le, don anyhow use le. paid back ur fren abit $$ den pay ur bill den save some for daily use n others 4 entertainment. okok..must be gd. save up some $$ for my levis jean ok. byebye.. takecare.miz u.

haiz..a bad day 4 me. having headachfrom yesterday till now. my head is like so heavy,must rest on bed. today wake up at 10am den papa ask me go eat cuz he bot food for me. aft tat,he 11am leave home.onli left me alone in tis hos.so bored. bored to death. so sianz. sso i do many hoswork, aft tat bath den play com n watch la bi xiao xin until 5pm,mummy come home. den today, my dardar so busy until cannot even tok to me for 10mins. always call me but aft 2-3 mins den put down le. look so busy so i nv go fan her. let her do her own things. haiz. hope tat weekend & holiday faster come. cuz i miz the days wen working & miz the days wen having fun outside wif my dar dar. hope tat i can acc her more n she can acc me more. weekdays i alr acc my family.i hope weekend i can acc my dardar. baobeix..u had made an account of we five, i am very happy but frenship is using time to make out de. if u all cant put me n meixiang into u three,don force urself. i don blame it. cuz u three always go out together,buy things together n always left out me n meixiang.cuz me n meixiang bot everytime can go meet u all or go out wif u all. so is not u all fault. ah boon jus now call me,ask whether monday wan go out. so i will oso ask u all come along cuz monday is a school hoilday.sunday is youth day. aft sch reopen,we will have less holidays,n we mus wait until december holidays le.i will miz my dardar n baobeix so so so much. i cant see my dar dar on weekdays n maybe on weekends cuz weekends i will be working. so i dono whether my dardar wan meet me aft work anot.cuz she will oso tired of travelling here n there rite. n for my baobeiz, i onli see them during me work on weekends n oso not long cuz i work morning,they work aftnoon. so haiz.. reali dono oso. so fan.so don wish to study but i have to. so wish to work onli. cuz work is not so stress. not like study.but if don have at least a O level cert,is like me is so useless lidat. haiz. later lose my family face. if i could be a bird,den will be gd.i can fly everywhere i wan without anyone caring.headach now..maybe cant use com liaoz. for few days...tml or maybe thursday, deviana is coming back,so miz her sia..

today is the last day of june.i hope from tml 1st july,my luck will be better n it will be better for me n airlia.finally aft u n me nv quarrel for three days den yesterday starts a quarrel. is not i wan quarrel wif u.is i early early alr ask u knock off den go home n u said ok ok. but than wen u wana knock off den u tell me u wan meet ur sis.den u forget everything u said to me lar.today i last mins tell u i go out. but u nv ask me MUST go home straight away.it different thing abt yest n today. u don always think tat i can angry but u cant. but in the first place,u nv said i must go home straight.somemore i haven eat.go home nobody. but yesterday is i 3pm something tell u go home aft work.straight away!! don u remember??!! so wad r u angrying now? my fault. u noe y i wan acc my fren to orchard,cuz i wana go mac, write tat i 11th july cannot work cuz of U. u don even noe tis n u blame me somemore i don think i am in the wrong cuz u nv ask me go home straight. y u & my frenz always must mistaken me before u all ask me. u think i like scolding u. no lo.i don like scolding u & i don like quarreling wif u lo. but deep in ur heart,u always think i treated u unfair.u think tis world treat u unnfair n u think god treated u unfair TOO. no! is not lidat.every human have their problems.every couple have their problems too. but i don think i treat u unfair from the day we quarrel abt i treat frenz better. if u don think so than i hack care le. if u don even noe how gd i treat u, forget it. n if u don even noe how much i did 4 u den oso forget it. anyway,i don even noe wen will u see tis. hope we r ok le. n u should noe me,i can forgive u veru fast if u r gd de. dont u?.. anyway,takecare..muackz..

itz was quite a good day but still sick.haiz.jus finish reading my dar dar blog.was feeling rather mixed feelings.was feeling rather sad n confuse. cuz she was so busy n tired. n i was so tired n so sick. i am telling u,me go down write my request to off on 11/7 earlier becuz i dono wen i will recover n i must early 1 week tell.actually andy say cannot den aft tat yesterday i suddenly worked cuz i wana andy to let me off on 11/7. n yesterday he say he will let me off on 11/7 le. i did it cuz of u, n u mistaken me.y is tis man...??!!!! kao!! n i jus now tell dardar tat meixiang ask me go monks.den dar dar say me is a 'dog'. KAO!! i oso haven say i wan go! i am asking u wan anot lo.somemore i oso no $$,oso cant go. than say me dog. fine! next time dar dar fren ask her go out, i will say her dog if she tells me. wad did i do sia.. as for my baobeix..i noe i got wrong in tis matter. n all of us got wrong. u all din even celebrate me birthday wif me,i oso nv blame u all,if even now u all still don tink i treat u all gd,den forget it. none of my frenz spent my birthday wif me lo.onli my gd DARDAR lo. wad is tis oso.. haiz.. so fan.. jus now go orchard wif shipei,deviana,sherry,sarah, was so hungry n i take photo wif them,they all still got give me two.! quite nice sia.. until now,me haven eat lar.haiz. dono wan wait till wad time. dono wen can go monks enjoy myself too.dono wen can go fisherman village eat alot of nice food again. haiz.. so wish to go sia.. anyway,i will spent my tis weekend carefully n nicely. only for sun,i have to work.!! haiz..later seeing u liao.so wish to hug u to sleep again.this song is specially for u , Britney spears - Everytime chorus: everytime i tried to fly apart without my wings, i feel so small, i guess i need u baby, everytime i see u in my dreams, i see your face, it hunting me, i guess i need u baby dar dar, this is wad i wana tell u....

wake up at 6am,so tired,yest had to work until 9.45pm, come back alr 11pm. so today still play in school,study, beside my class,it comes a bung called ashely.. quite a cool bung.can say is my type but i onli got airlia in my heart. haha. den today aft sch,go long john eat with shipei,deviana,lay ying,sherry n yoke hiang. haha. laugh until siao. than tat stupid idiot mysteriorperson sms me again. fu*king person. chee*ye. airlia come my house today to eat dinner..hahaha.. 4 days later is our 10 months. ha.

really feel so sad n confuse now.dono reali how should i take my frenz as. should i stop contact them n carry on with my life wif my family&airlia n sch frenz onli?? i reali dono. i think i should quit my job so tat i wont be seeing them.is not i hate them.is jus tat,i wana avoid. dono wad they r thinking.if they reali don wish tell me their problems,i don mind. onli deviana can be trusted. onli she wont slip my secret out. maybe i don mean to have a true fren. i am thinking so much of things which is extra. but izzit true tat every problem have a way to solved??? i dono. n for my dar, i am feeling tired. yest wen quarrel,actually wana tell her, i don wan be wif her le. but i din. cuz i noe, is me angry den will lidat think.i don wana regret. everytime quarrel wif her,reali so wish to leave her n don ever care her. but i cant. i jus don wish to regret. many peoples think tat lesbians is the most suckest thingz. but y am there still so many lesbians n gay. reali wan see tat my family can reali accepted the way i am now. i dono abt the future n i don bellieve forture teller. but i noe, me n her cant be forever. one day, it will be she leave me or i leave her. we r not mean together. cuz we onli quarrel. everyday quarrel, our relation wont be gd at all. if can, i wana be wif her forever. i noe many peoples think tat i am silly n childish in thinking tis way, but i don care. jus tat i should follow my feelings. n tis is my reason for living. i wana be in love, i wana been loved by her. n tats all. i really wana get back to last time wif my baobeix.nv laugh till very happily le. cuz i was not happy. although i have the things i wanted. i noe who betray me le, is shipei. is tat ger who i treated as my jiemei. is her. wad have i done to receive all tis. i don wana noe if it was her. haiz..

today, life still the same.going to intervhange,meet lay ying n deviana,den sit 88 go sch. almost late today. den at 8am,me having DnT lesson, nv bring books, so sit on the floor,leaning the chair,in air con room, so i fall asleep.until 9.15am, den lay ying ask me wake up. so shiokz. kinda tired. aft recess, about 11.20, me having english. half the class decided to tell teacher we nv bring books so. half the class pupils plus me carry our table n chair go sit outside the class n after tat we too noise,teacher ask us to carry our table n chair to ava room outside sit.we sit as a square, den chit chat den play games, den anyone walk pass, we disturb them. on the way carrying the table n chair to ava room out, we walk pass ashely class.den she looks at me, n me look at her. she reali got a cool face, n looks dao! kao!. aft tat, we got assembly, den me saw ashely looking at me, as if she noes me. don think so. haha. so..airlia,hows ur feeling sia... u were toking abt chio bu in hospital rite. haha. i am toking abt ashely. so how?wana find quarrel? sad rite.. serve u rite lo.. u started first. actually don wana say all tis in blog. haha.but aft seeing ur blog, i decided to say. aft tat,i reach home, do nth. so now going sleep liao. later den eat dinner.hahaha.haiz. yest me act as the mysteryperson n use starhub sms S.P n she reply said, who am i n like so shock n like as if she is the mysteryperson lo. so now, i noe le.fine. as for my baobei. i think i give up. stop caring abt them.haiz.

yest me n airlia had a quarrel over the things i wrote in blog yest. n we didnt sms or call each other till tis morning she sms me. yest me slp from 8.10pm to tis morning. forget to see 'hai you ming tian.'n deviana told me tat shipei is not the one who betray me. wad am i going to do. i reali very confuse. whose the hell who got me into all tis. f**k.. reali very tired. not going to school tml. don wish go too. bored sch. stupid idiot bloody mr chua. fu*k*r.. hate him like hell. wad am i going to do.. airlia,shipei,baobeix.. reali dono sia. i reali don like ashley. i reali treat shipei as my best fren. i reali dote my baobeix alot. thats all i wana say. but eho will understand. no lol... i love u alot. reali alot. never get bored with u even wen we were together already for the 10th month. you should noe, out there, there r more others better looking than ashley, i oso nv fall for them, i promise i wont. she oso everytime nv come to sch de. i think aft some weeks, she will quit sch de. it had got nth to do wif me, i don care. wad u do n wad u feel is not the same. u ask me to leave u n be with ashley but inside u, u still sms n call me, u still love me. i noe. tats y i din give up saying i love u. remember wad i sent u: wenever i dream of u, it means i miss u alot.. wenever i say i love u, it means i really love u alot. everytime i tried, to fly afar without my wings, i feel so small, i guess i need u baby, everytime i see, u in my dreams, i see ur face, its huanting me, i guess i miss u baby..

today still go to sch as usual. but late abit ah.aft sch, went eat lunch wif deviana. only lao na free sia.2nd n 4th na go home den 3rd na stay in sch with 6th na. den 7th na go meet stead. wad sia. everyday so many programs!! aft eating, went home den change into my sports attire den go gym wif my sister. very tired. mon 19th went gym with deviana.tue 20th went running wif sis downstair.today went gym wif pei. haha. almost tis whole weeks will be doing many exercise. tml still got napha 2.4km run. haha. if everyday do sit up 35 times. sure will no tummy in 1month. haha. good good. me today weight at my P.E period.wad sia, 51.2kg. kao!!!!!!!! really have to diet le lo. jus now ate 3 spoonful of rice den drank one small bowl of soup den ate half apple. so, tis week is the starting ok my diet period.

yesterday,went out wif my sister than meet huiqing..really quite enjoyable. bot two clips.one 4 baobei eunice n another one 4 baobei may. nv bot for huiqing cuz she oso got bot for her own. i really tat its only wen eunice n may quarrel than they will come find me.if not,wen they nv quarrel n was gd,they oso nv think of me.really feel irritated. y my frens treated me like this.was really unfair to me. wen got problems than find me. wen things r fine with them,they wont even bother find me. wad the... i really have nothing to say lo.i hate to say it but i still have to say out.my heart really don feel good.i treated all my frens better den my stead.y my frens must betray me wen i did nothing bad to them.am i really such a bad fren to every1? or am i too stupid to treat them so gd.i really don understand from the day S.P backstab me,betray me. i really felt tat i change alot.from a cheerful ger to a no emotion,no smile,no nothing de me. i hate this peishan of me now.really hate. putting a fake smile infront of every1 out there.tried to make myself feel better without frens,family n stead, but the hardest i tried, the more unhappy i was.every of my family members n stead thinks that i am a very strong ger,which can live on myself. but no one noes, i was very lonely inside. sometimes,really feel to live on someone.cuz i was tired.the more i wanted the person,the make i care.i felt that nowdays,i very easy PC.very easy angry.cuz i reali dono wad my heart is thinking.reali love #02 alot but i dono really noe hoe to express to let #02 noe.very very trouble n fan abt tat.although care u alot,but din show out.i oso dono wad am i doing all this while.always angry u n my frens.everytime meet u or wad,oso nv tok much. jus stares in the air.dono thinking wad.all cuz of my frens out there.influencing me.esp P.S n S.P!!!! say le oso very angry n sad.don say le. maybe i shouldn't treat my frens gd.but i cant help treating them like my baobei. very xin ku. very tong ku. i reali dono abt my frenship wif every1.**confuse**.. can anyone jus tell me am i a very bad fren?? everyday work till tired n late.cuz of #02 n cuz i don wana remember things tat make me sad n i don wan cry in the dark in my room. nvm..today is a new day..hope everything is fine.. i was so tired alr. but don wana slp...#02, go sleep lol.. i noe u very very tired..nite.. love u.

jus 5 hours ago,from 7pm till now,was feeling so happy,so loved by my dar dar.wad can i do,haha,jus laugh with her,n make her laugh. tat was the thing i wan everyday. as fer my baobei,i alr dono how to say,they mistaken tat i don wana tell them thingys,but i onli tell malaysian crew. i alr said,they r my baobeiz,i sure wan tell them right.but i cant possible to tell three in one shot right.if they r worried abt me n they care alot fer me,i am telling u all tat,i oso care fer u all alot lo.baobeiz,u can ask airlia,i treat u all beta than her.i everytime becuz of u all piang sia her,throw her aside.i trust u all but u all should alr noe wad happen to me n my jiemei in sch right.u noe they betray me n hurt me deep right.i reali dono how lo.how to be hard hearted n not forgive them.i noe if is MAY,u alr beat the person who betray u right?but i don noe how to don forgive my jiemei.i told her everything of mine,in the end i exchange a betray. i can tell u all my things cuz i trust u all but do u all trust me? u all mistaken me. i understand u all,cuz i go tried to understand. ok,don say abt tat le.should say some happy things.haiz.school going reopen n i cant see my baobeiz so much le.but hope u all wont forget me!! n my dar dar,i always miss u n love u.No others people.ok.. don always quarrel about ur jealousy le lar.. don always say wan muackz muackz le horx..

today is the first day of sch reopen, i am having a headach & almost fainted. today leh,my dar dar hor so badx, morning sms halfway den slp like pig.slp until 9am den wake up. *zhu* until now,i still very giddy.. haix.wen will i recover lehx.. baobeix,if u say tat me n ur suo wei de laopox got a very big different den i got nothing to say.so u all r my baobei not my laopox den i will onli tell my laopox my things. is u say baobei n laopox got big different right.nvm. now sch reopen le right, i wont see u all so much de larx. i got tell u all or nv tell u all my problems is still the same!! u all three together can liao, i don need to join u all either le right. its okay.. on ur birthday i don tell u cuz is ur birthday right.so how can i tell u.nvm. everythings over.holiday over. now we all jus concentrate on studies. others, don need say so much ok. u all takecare lo.nth to say le. dardar, don be naughty! n i am very tired tis few days. n today oso dono y. so giddy n wanted to fainted.tis is the third day nv quarrel le.keep it on ok. n i don wish see u & juehui & cyn always together.i don wana see u call them or they call u again ok. remember takecare n drink lots of water. take pay le, don anyhow use le. paid back ur fren abit $$ den pay ur bill den save some for daily use n others 4 entertainment. okok..must be gd. save up some $$ for my levis jean ok. byebye.. takecare.miz u.

home.onli left me alone in tis hos.so bored. bored to death. so sianz. sso i do many hoswork, aft tat bath den play com n watch la bi xiao xin until 5pm,mummy come home. den today, my dardar so busy until cannot even tok to me for 10mins. always call me but aft 2-3 mins den put down le. look so busy so i nv go fan her. let her do her own things. haiz. hope tat weekend & holiday faster come. cuz i miz the days wen working & miz the days wen having fun outside wif my dar dar. hope tat i can acc her more n she can acc me more. weekdays i alr acc my family.i hope weekend i can acc my dardar. baobeix..u had made an account of we five, i am very happy but frenship is using time to make out de. if u all cant put me n meixiang into u three,don force urself. i don blame it. cuz u three always go out together,buy things together n always left out me n meixiang.cuz me n meixiang bot everytime can go meet u all or go out wif u all. so is not u all fault. ah boon jus now call me,ask whether monday wan go out. so i will oso ask u all come along cuz monday is a school hoilday.sunday is youth day. aft sch reopen,we will have less holidays,n we mus wait until december holidays le.i will miz my dardar n baobeix so so so much. i cant see my dar dar on weekdays n maybe on weekends cuz weekends i will be working. so i dono whether my dardar wan meet me aft work anot.cuz she will oso tired of travelling here n there rite. n for my baobeiz, i onli see them during me work on weekends n oso not long cuz i work morning,they work aftnoon. so haiz.. reali dono oso. so fan.so don wish to study but i have to. so wish to work onli. cuz work is not so stress. not like study.but if don have at least a O level cert,is like me is so useless lidat. haiz. later lose my family face. if i could be a bird,den will be gd.i can fly everywhere i wan without anyone caring.headach now..maybe cant use com liaoz. for few days...tml or maybe thursday, deviana is coming back,so miz her sia..

today is the last day of june.i hope from tml 1st july,my luck will be better n it will be better for me n airlia.finally aft u n me nv quarrel for three days den yesterday starts a quarrel. is not i wan quarrel wif u.is i early early alr ask u knock off den go home n u said ok ok. but than wen u wana knock off den u tell me u wan meet ur sis.den u forget everything u said to me lar.today i last mins tell u i go out. but u nv ask me MUST go home straight away.it different thing abt yest n today. u don always think tat i can angry but u cant. but in the first place,u nv said i must go home straight.somemore i haven eat.go home nobody. but yesterday is i 3pm something tell u go home aft work.straight away!! don u remember??!! so wad r u angrying now? my fault. u noe y i wan acc my fren to orchard,cuz i wana go mac, write tat i 11th july cannot work cuz of U. u don even noe tis n u blame me somemore i don think i am in the wrong cuz u nv ask me go home straight. y u & my frenz always must mistaken me before u all ask me. u think i like scolding u. no lo.i don like scolding u & i don like quarreling wif u lo. but deep in ur heart,u always think i treated u unfair.u think tis world treat u unnfair n u think god treated u unfair TOO. no! is not lidat.every human have their problems.every couple have their problems too. but i don think i treat u unfair from the day we quarrel abt i treat frenz better. if u don think so than i hack care le. if u don even noe how gd i treat u, forget it. n if u don even noe how much i did 4 u den oso forget it. anyway,i don even noe wen will u see tis. hope we r ok le. n u should noe me,i can forgive u veru fast if u r gd de. dont u?.. anyway,takecare..muackz..

itz was quite a good day but still sick.haiz.jus finish reading my dar dar blog.was feeling rather mixed feelings.was feeling rather sad n confuse. cuz she was so busy n tired. n i was so tired n so sick. i am telling u,me go down write my request to off on 11/7 earlier becuz i dono wen i will recover n i must early 1 week tell.actually andy say cannot den aft tat yesterday i suddenly worked cuz i wana andy to let me off on 11/7. n yesterday he say he will let me off on 11/7 le. i did it cuz of u, n u mistaken me.y is tis man...??!!!! kao!! n i jus now tell dardar tat meixiang ask me go monks.den dar dar say me is a 'dog'. KAO!! i oso haven say i wan go! i am asking u wan anot lo.somemore i oso no $$,oso cant go. than say me dog. fine! next time dar dar fren ask her go out, i will say her dog if she tells me. wad did i do sia.. as for my baobeix..i noe i got wrong in tis matter. n all of us got wrong. u all din even celebrate me birthday wif me,i oso nv blame u all,if even now u all still don tink i treat u all gd,den forget it. none of my frenz spent my birthday wif me lo.onli my gd DARDAR lo. wad is tis oso.. haiz.. so fan.. jus now go orchard wif shipei,deviana,sherry,sarah, was so hungry n i take photo wif them,they all still got give me two.! quite nice sia.. until now,me haven eat lar.haiz. dono wan wait till wad time. dono wen can go monks enjoy myself too.dono wen can go fisherman village eat alot of nice food again. haiz.. so wish to go sia.. anyway,i will spent my tis weekend carefully n nicely. only for sun,i have to work.!! haiz..later seeing u liao.so wish to hug u to sleep again.this song is specially for u , Britney spears - Everytime chorus: everytime i tried to fly apart without my wings, i feel so small, i guess i need u baby, everytime i see u in my dreams, i see your face, it hunting me, i guess i need u baby dar dar, this is wad i wana tell u....

wake up at 6am,so tired,yest had to work until 9.45pm, come back alr 11pm. so today still play in school,study, beside my class,it comes a bung called ashely.. quite a cool bung.can say is my type but i onli got airlia in my heart. haha. den today aft sch,go long john eat with shipei,deviana,lay ying,sherry n yoke hiang. haha. laugh until siao. than tat stupid idiot mysteriorperson sms me again. fu*king person. chee*ye. airlia come my house today to eat dinner..hahaha.. 4 days later is our 10 months. ha.

really feel so sad n confuse now.dono reali how should i take my frenz as. should i stop contact them n carry on with my life wif my family&airlia n sch frenz onli?? i reali dono. i think i should quit my job so tat i wont be seeing them.is not i hate them.is jus tat,i wana avoid. dono wad they r thinking.if they reali don wish tell me their problems,i don mind. onli deviana can be trusted. onli she wont slip my secret out. maybe i don mean to have a true fren. i am thinking so much of things which is extra. but izzit true tat every problem have a way to solved??? i dono. n for my dar, i am feeling tired. yest wen quarrel,actually wana tell her, i don wan be wif her le. but i din. cuz i noe, is me angry den will lidat think.i don wana regret. everytime quarrel wif her,reali so wish to leave her n don ever care her. but i cant. i jus don wish to regret. many peoples think tat lesbians is the most suckest thingz. but y am there still so many lesbians n gay. reali wan see tat my family can reali accepted the way i am now. i dono abt the future n i don bellieve forture teller. but i noe, me n her cant be forever. one day, it will be she leave me or i leave her. we r not mean together. cuz we onli quarrel. everyday quarrel, our relation wont be gd at all. if can, i wana be wif her forever. i noe many peoples think tat i am silly n childish in thinking tis way, but i don care. jus tat i should follow my feelings. n tis is my reason for living. i wana be in love, i wana been loved by her. n tats all. i really wana get back to last time wif my baobeix.nv laugh till very happily le. cuz i was not happy. although i have the things i wanted. i noe who betray me le, is shipei. is tat ger who i treated as my jiemei. is her. wad have i done to receive all tis. i don wana noe if it was her. haiz..

today, life still the same.going to intervhange,meet lay ying n deviana,den sit 88 go sch. almost late today. den at 8am,me having DnT lesson, nv bring books, so sit on the floor,leaning the chair,in air con room, so i fall asleep.until 9.15am, den lay ying ask me wake up. so shiokz. kinda tired. aft recess, about 11.20, me having english. half the class decided to tell teacher we nv bring books so. half the class pupils plus me carry our table n chair go sit outside the class n after tat we too noise,teacher ask us to carry our table n chair to ava room outside sit.we sit as a square, den chit chat den play games, den anyone walk pass, we disturb them. on the way carrying the table n chair to ava room out, we walk pass ashely class.den she looks at me, n me look at her. she reali got a cool face, n looks dao! kao!. aft tat, we got assembly, den me saw ashely looking at me, as if she noes me. don think so. haha. so..airlia,hows ur feeling sia... u were toking abt chio bu in hospital rite. haha. i am toking abt ashely. so how?wana find quarrel? sad rite.. serve u rite lo.. u started first. actually don wana say all tis in blog. haha.but aft seeing ur blog, i decided to say. aft tat,i reach home, do nth. so now going sleep liao. later den eat dinner.hahaha.haiz. yest me act as the mysteryperson n use starhub sms S.P n she reply said, who am i n like so shock n like as if she is the mysteryperson lo. so now, i noe le.fine. as for my baobei. i think i give up. stop caring abt them.haiz.

yest me n airlia had a quarrel over the things i wrote in blog yest. n we didnt sms or call each other till tis morning she sms me. yest me slp from 8.10pm to tis morning. forget to see 'hai you ming tian.'n deviana told me tat shipei is not the one who betray me. wad am i going to do. i reali very confuse. whose the hell who got me into all tis. f**k.. reali very tired. not going to school tml. don wish go too. bored sch. stupid idiot bloody mr chua. fu*k*r.. hate him like hell. wad am i going to do.. airlia,shipei,baobeix.. reali dono sia. i reali don like ashley. i reali treat shipei as my best fren. i reali dote my baobeix alot. thats all i wana say. but eho will understand. no lol... i love u alot. reali alot. never get bored with u even wen we were together already for the 10th month. you should noe, out there, there r more others better looking than ashley, i oso nv fall for them, i promise i wont. she oso everytime nv come to sch de. i think aft some weeks, she will quit sch de. it had got nth to do wif me, i don care. wad u do n wad u feel is not the same. u ask me to leave u n be with ashley but inside u, u still sms n call me, u still love me. i noe. tats y i din give up saying i love u. remember wad i sent u: wenever i dream of u, it means i miss u alot.. wenever i say i love u, it means i really love u alot. everytime i tried, to fly afar without my wings, i feel so small, i guess i need u baby, everytime i see, u in my dreams, i see ur face, its huanting me, i guess i miss u baby..

today still go to sch as usual. but late abit ah.aft sch, went eat lunch wif deviana. only lao na free sia.2nd n 4th na go home den 3rd na stay in sch with 6th na. den 7th na go meet stead. wad sia. everyday so many programs!! aft eating, went home den change into my sports attire den go gym wif my sister. very tired. mon 19th went gym with deviana.tue 20th went running wif sis downstair.today went gym wif pei. haha. almost tis whole weeks will be doing many exercise. tml still got napha 2.4km run. haha. if everyday do sit up 35 times. sure will no tummy in 1month. haha. good good. me today weight at my P.E period.wad sia, 51.2kg. kao!!!!!!!! really have to diet le lo. jus now ate 3 spoonful of rice den drank one small bowl of soup den ate half apple. so, tis week is the starting ok my diet period.
